celestial_bodies.name: Milky Way
celestial_bodies.description: The galaxy that contains our Solar System.

celestial_bodies.name: Andromeda
celestial_bodies.description: The closest spiral galaxy to the Milky Way.

celestial_bodies.name: Messier 87
celestial_bodies.description: A massive elliptical galaxy with a supermassive black hole.

celestial_bodies.name: Earth
celestial_bodies.description: The only known planet to support life.

celestial_bodies.name: Jupiter
celestial_bodies.description: The largest planet in the Solar System with a giant storm known as the Great Red Spot.

celestial_bodies.name: Kepler-22b
celestial_bodies.description: A potentially habitable exoplanet orbiting within its star's habitable zone.

celestial_bodies.name: Proxima Centauri b
celestial_bodies.description: An exoplanet in the habitable zone of the red dwarf Proxima Centauri.
